name: Homestyle Potato Soup
description: A warming way to satisfy your hunger and your taste buds.

ingredients.name: medium potatoes
ingredients.additionalInstruction: peeled and cut into large pieces

ingredients.name: French Onion Dip Mix or CCB Dip Mix

preparation: In a Multipurpose Pot, bring Nourish Broth and potatoes to a boil over high heat. Reduce temperature and simmer for 15 minutes until potatoes are tender.
Using a potato masher, break potatoes into smaller pieces. Soup should still be 'lumpy'.
Stir in hot milk and dip mix.
Season to taste with salt and pepper. Reheat until hot. To prevent curdling, do not boil.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 2 cups leafy greens with 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavors of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!

products.name: French Onion Dip Mix
summary: Ruffled chips and crunchy veggies don’t stand a chance when French Onion is on the table! Gluten and sodium free, and packed with all the delicious taste of toasted onion and parsley, this blend makes a kid-friendly dip, but it doesn’t stop there. Use it to season any savoury dish where you’d like to liven up the flavour with onion — without having to chop or roast a bunch of onions!

products.name: CCB Dip Mix
summary: Cheese. Chives. Bacon. How's that for a totally irresistible trio? Our very own smoky vegetarian bacon, made from pinto beans, is the secret star of this oh-so-yummy dip.
This blend is all about versatility and we recommend taking it way beyond the dip bowl—use CCB in any dish that could use a little levelling up.
